data.comment: Today's referee, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez, has blown to start the match.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 3, Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
Throw-in for Bilbao at San Mames.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo pushes forward through Santi Mina, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 6, Free kick Bilbao.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Celta Vigo.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Celta Vigo.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 9, Throw-in high up the field for Bilbao in Bilbao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 10, Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Iker Muniain for Bilbao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Bilbao at San Mames.
In the minute 15, Yuri Berchiche (Bilbao) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
In Bilbao Celta Vigo attack through Lucas Olaza. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 18, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Bilbao have a dangerous throw-in.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
Mikel Vesga of Bilbao gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bilbao.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at San Mames.
In the minute 25, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 26, Unai Nunez for Bilbao has been booked by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez and receives a first yellow card.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Celta Vigo.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Celta Vigo.
Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 29, Asier Villalibre's header is off-target for Bilbao.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Mikel Vesga (Bilbao) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Throw-in Bilbao.
In the minute 42, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Mikel Balenziaga is replacing Yuri Berchiche for the home team.
Bilbao's Alex Berenguer breaks free at San Mames. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 48, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
Goal kick for Bilbao at San Mames.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At San Mames, Jeison Murillo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 55, Bilbao's Alex Berenguer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Celta Vigo are coming forward and Lucas Olaza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 56, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at San Mames.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a throw-in for Celta Vigo, close to Bilbao's area.
In the minute 58, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo push upfield but Jorge Figueroa Vazquez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Hugo Mallo.
Great play from Santi Mina to set up the goal.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Asier Villalibre with Raul Garcia. This is the second substitution made today by Gaizka Garitano.
The home team replace Unai Vencedor with Unai Lopez.
Celta Vigo needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 64, Bilbao to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Bilbao's Mikel Vesga breaks free at San Mames. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Bilbao at San Mames.
In the minute 69, Bilbao to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eduardo Coudet is making the team's first substitution at San Mames with Joseph Aidoo replacing Nolito.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Bilbao's Raul Garcia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Bilbao at San Mames.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 77, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Bilbao.
Goal! Celta Vigo extend their lead to 0-2 through Iago Aspas.
In the minute 79, Gaizka Garitano (Bilbao) is making a fourth substitution, with Oihan Sancet replacing Inaki Williams.
Jon Morcillo is on a sub for Iker Muniain for Bilbao.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Bilbao.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Celta Vigo.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Mikel Vesga (Bilbao) gets a yellow card.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 86, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Free kick Celta Vigo.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo make their second substitution with Fran Beltran replacing Iago Aspas.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Miguel Baeza is replacing Brais Mendez for Celta Vigo at San Mames.
